trans-unit.source: Represents a map area.
trans-unit.target: 表示映射区。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea>类</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea>的新实例

trans-unit.source: However, an easier way to create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea> object is to use one of the overloaded `Add` or `Insert` methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreasCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 但是，更简单的方法创建自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea>对象是使用其中一个重载`Add`或`Insert`方法的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreasCollection>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreasCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref> class with the specified URL and <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref>类与指定的 URL 和<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The destination URL or anchor point of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object that defines the shape of the map area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>定义映射区形状的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref> class with the specified URL and <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref>类与指定的 URL 和<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: The destination URL or anchor point of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that defines the shape of the rectangular map area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>定义矩形映射区形状的结构。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref> class with the specified shape, URL and coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref>指定的形状、 URL 和坐标的类。

trans-unit.source: The shape of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区形状。

trans-unit.source: The destination URL or anchor point of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

trans-unit.source: An array of coordinates that determine the location of the circle, rectangle or polygon.
trans-unit.target: 确定圆形、 矩形或多边形的位置的坐标的数组。

trans-unit.source: The type of shape that is being used determines the type of coordinates required.
trans-unit.target: 正在使用的形状的类型确定所需的坐标的类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref> class with the specified tooltip text, URL, attributes, postback value, path and tag.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref>具有指定工具提示文本、 URL、 属性、 回发值、 路径和标记的类。

trans-unit.source: The tool tip for the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The destination URL or anchor point of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

trans-unit.source: The attributes for the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区特性。

trans-unit.source: The postback value which can be processed on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 可以在进行处理的回发值<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The area coordinates of a map area as graphic path.
trans-unit.target: 作为图形路径的地图区域的区域坐标。

trans-unit.source: The tag to indicate whether the map area is custom.
trans-unit.target: 要指示映射区是自定义的标记。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref> class with the specified tooltip text, URL, attributes, postback value, rectangle coordinates and tag.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref>具有指定工具提示文本、 URL、 属性、 回发值、 矩形坐标和标记的类。

trans-unit.source: The tool tip for the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The destination URL or anchor point of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

trans-unit.source: The attributes for the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区特性。

trans-unit.source: The postback value which can be processed on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 可以在进行处理的回发值<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 坐标<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The tag to indicate whether the map area is custom.
trans-unit.target: 要指示映射区是自定义的标记。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref> class with the specified shape, tooltip text, URL, attributes, postback value, coordinates and tag.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref>指定的形状、 工具提示文本、 URL、 属性、 回发值、 坐标和标记的类。

trans-unit.source: The shape of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区形状。

trans-unit.source: The tool tip for the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The destination URL or anchor point of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

trans-unit.source: The attributes for the map area.
trans-unit.target: 映射区特性。

trans-unit.source: The postback value which can be processed on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 可以在进行处理的回发值<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An array of coordinates that determine the location of the circle, rectangle or polygon.
trans-unit.target: 确定圆形、 矩形或多边形的位置的坐标的数组。

trans-unit.source: The type of shape that is being used determines the type of coordinates required.
trans-unit.target: 正在使用的形状的类型确定所需的坐标的类型。

trans-unit.source: The tag to indicate whether the map area is custom.
trans-unit.target: 要指示映射区是自定义的标记。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the coordinates of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的坐标<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Coordinates property is usually used to set the coordinates of a custom map area object that has a user-defined shape and coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 坐标属性通常用于设置具有用户定义的形状和坐标的自定义地图区域对象的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates that must be specified for a custom map area depend on the shape of the map area: - Circle.
trans-unit.target: 必须为自定义映射区指定的坐标取决于映射区的形状:-圆。

trans-unit.source: Three coordinates must be provided: "x1, y1, r", where "x1, y2" are the coordinates of the center of the circle, and "r" is the radius of the circle.
trans-unit.target: 必须提供三个坐标:"x1，y1，r"，其中"x&1;，y2"是圆的中心的坐标和"r"是圆的半径。

trans-unit.source: - Rectangle.
trans-unit.target: -矩形。

trans-unit.source: Four coordinates must be provided: "x1, y1, x2, y2", where "x1, y1" are the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the rectangle and "x2, y2" are the coordinates of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 必须提供四个坐标:"x1，y1，x2，y2"，其中"x1，y1"是"x2，y2"以及矩形的左上角的坐标是矩形右下角的坐标。

trans-unit.source: - Polygon.
trans-unit.target: -多边形。

trans-unit.source: Two or more x and y pairs must be provided "x1, y1, x2, y2...xn, yn", where each "x, y" pair contains the coordinates of one vertex of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 两个或多个 x 和 y 必须提供对"x1，y1，x2，y2...xn，yn"，其中每个"x，y"对包含多边形的一个顶点坐标。

trans-unit.source: When setting coordinates, use the relative coordinate system of the chart, where the top-left corner of the chart image is "0,0" and the bottom-right corner of the image is "100,100".
trans-unit.target: 在设置坐标时，使用相对坐标系统的图表，其中的图表图像的左上角是"0，0"，图像的右下角是"，100100"。

trans-unit.source: After the shape and coordinates are defined for the map area, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.ToolTip%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.Url%2A> and/or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.MapAreaAttributes%2A> properties can be used to specify a particular user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 定义映射区的形状和坐标之后<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.ToolTip%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.Url%2A>和/或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.MapAreaAttributes%2A>属性可以用于指定特定的用户交互。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.MapAreaAttributes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.Url%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.ToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note the following: - A client-side image map will only be created at run time if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A> property of the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object is `true`, which is the default.
trans-unit.target: 请注意以下事项:-仅客户端图像映射将创建在运行时中，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A>根的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象是`true`，这是默认设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To create an image map by adding a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea> object to the map areas collection, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.RenderType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object must be set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RenderType>.
trans-unit.target: -若要通过添加<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea>到映射区集合，该<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.RenderType%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象必须设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RenderType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RenderType></xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart></xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.RenderType%2A>对象</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea>来创建映像映射

trans-unit.source: It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but a special technique must be used.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用特殊的技术。

trans-unit.source: An array of coordinates that is dependent on the shape of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 依赖于映射区形状的坐标数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the map area is custom.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示映射区是自定义。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the map area is custom; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果映射区是自定义;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the attributes of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置映射区特性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the attributes of the map area that corresponds to a particular chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示特定的图表元素的属性相对应的地图区域。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置映射区的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the map area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示在地图区域的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the postback value which can be processed on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可以在进行处理的回发值<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the postback value passed to <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示传递给的回发值<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shape of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置形状的<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is usually used to set the shape of a custom map area object, which has a user-defined shape and coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于设置自定义地图区域对象，它具有用户定义的形状和坐标的形状。

trans-unit.source: The shape of the custom map area determines the type of coordinates that must be specified, and available shapes are circles, rectangles and polygons.
trans-unit.target: 自定义映射区形状确定必须指定的坐标的类型和可用形状包括圆形、 矩形和多边形。

trans-unit.source: When retrieving the shapes of <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea> objects that are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreasCollection>, any shape that is not a rectangle or a circle will be considered a polygon.
trans-unit.target: 检索的形状时<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea>存储在对象<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreasCollection>，不是一个矩形或圆任何形状将被视为多边形。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreasCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea>

trans-unit.source: For example, a custom map area can be added to the map areas collection using a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object as a parameter, which allows any type of shape to be used.
trans-unit.target: 例如，自定义映射区可以添加到地图区域的集合使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>对象作为一个参数，它允许任何一种要使用的形状。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>

trans-unit.source: If the Shape property of this particular <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea> object is retrieved, it will return a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreaShape>.
trans-unit.target: 如果此尤其是<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea>在检索对象时，它将返回一种<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreaShape>。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreaShape></xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea>的形状属性

trans-unit.source: After the shape and coordinates of a map area are defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.ToolTip%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.Url%2A>and/or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.MapAreaAttributes%2A> properties can be used to specify a particular user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 在定义的形状和映射区的坐标之后， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.ToolTip%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.Url%2A>和/或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.MapAreaAttributes%2A>属性可以用于指定特定的用户交互。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.MapAreaAttributes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.Url%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea.ToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note the following: - A client-side image map will only be created at run-time if the IsMapEnabled property of the root Chart object is true, which is the default.
trans-unit.target: 请注意以下事项:-客户端图像映射将仅创建在运行时如果根图表对象的 IsMapEnabled 属性为 true 时，这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: - To create an image map by adding a MapArea object to the map areas collection the RenderType property of the Chart object MUST be RenderType.ImageTag.
trans-unit.target: -若要创建映像通过将是 MapArea 对象添加到映射区集合图表对象的 RenderType 属性的映射必须 RenderType.ImageTag。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but a special technique must be used.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用特殊的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreaShape"></xref> enumeration value that determines the shape of a map area object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreaShape"> </xref>确定映射区域对象的形状的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip for the map area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置映射区的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示图表元素的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the destination URL or anchor point of the map area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the map area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

trans-unit.source: To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".
trans-unit.target: 若要使用绝对 URL，启动"http://"或"www。"开头的字符串表达式。

trans-unit.source: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes, it will be treated as a relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串不是以这些前缀之一开头，它将被视为相对 URL。
